        <div class="comment-container clearfix   " id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6718">
        <div class="actions">
                    <button tabindex="0" class="comments-button-small flag Bxz-bb P-2" title="Report Abuse">
                        <i class="Icon C-w Fz-m"></i>
                    </button>
        </div>            <div class="img-container">
                <img src="https://socialprofiles.zenfs.com/images/45776bd1a1c5f0b17c2f26c5bdb395a1_48.png" title="Baba Ganouj" width="48" height="48">            </div>
            <div class="container" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6717">
                <div class="nickname">
                        <span tabindex="0" class="int profile-link" data-guid="A4NLQK2KTPJWBJPFFBCF2MTQCQ">Baba Ganouj</span>
                    <span class="comment-timestamp">8 hours ago</span>
                    <div tabindex="0" id="down-vote-box" class="int vote-box down">
                        <span class="count">2</span>
                        <i class="GSIcon IconThumbDown Fz-m Va-m comment-thumb-down"></i>
                    </div>
                    <div tabindex="0" id="up-vote-box" class="int vote-box up">
                        <span class="count">0</span>
                        <i class="GSIcon IconThumbUp Fz-m Va-m comment-thumb-up"></i>
                    </div>

                </div>
                <div class="text-container comments-truncate" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6716">
                    <p class="comment-content">
                    People keep forgetting that police is a verb as well as a noun.<br>
For police to properly do their job, people need to comply with the police's requests.<br>
Unfortunately people forget that the police are like a very large bull in a pasture.<br>
When people go by and provoke the bull continuously, the bull will eventually get riled enough to retaliate. When the bull does retaliate, the person who last tormented the bull may think the response was a little aggressive - but that's a perception problem.<br>
<br>
To put it another way. say that a crowd of people walks by you every day. Every day, one of them kicks you square in the balls. Which one did it? You don't know, and can either lash out randomly, or shake it off and go about your business. After a while the crowd believes that it is their individual right to kick you in the balls as they go by. One day, one of them is out by himself, and decides to kick you in the nuts anyway. This time, you know full well who did it, and you ensure that he is not able to do it again.<br>
<br>
The point... since we cannot know what is going through one anothers' mind, we typically try to assume that the next person we meet will not kill us. Police do not have that luxury; they must assume that the next person they meet COULD BE a potential threat, until proven otherwise. In other words, the police MUST BE the bull. F'k with them, and get the horns. Treat them kindly, and they will be your best friend.<br>
<br>
THE CHOICE - and therefore THE RESPONSIBILITY is yours first.<br>
Take responsibility for yourself and make THE CHOICE to be respectful to the police.<br>
Give respect, get respect. Give a kick to the nuts, and you will get the horns.<br>
<br>
Anyone who responds with some lame BS argument that too many rounds were fired is a fascist pig.
                    </p>
                    <div class="more-text-button">More</div>
                </div>

                    <button tabindex="0" class="comments-button-small flag Bxz-bb P-2" title="Report Abuse">
                        <i class="Icon C-w Fz-m"></i>
                    </button>
        </div>            <div class="img-container">
                <img src="https://socialprofiles.zenfs.com/images/a051cefa5ee8b0a7772b8815e89c9de0_48.png" title="Bk" width="48" height="48">            </div>
            <div class="container" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6722">
                <div class="nickname">
                        <span tabindex="0" class="int profile-link" data-guid="HVR3QJDL6JRTEF6RBYS7WMSEIY">Bk</span>
                    <span class="comment-timestamp">10 hours ago</span>
                    <div tabindex="0" id="down-vote-box" class="int vote-box down">
                        <span class="count">2</span>
                        <i class="GSIcon IconThumbDown Fz-m Va-m comment-thumb-down"></i>
                    </div>
                    <div tabindex="0" id="up-vote-box" class="int vote-box up">
                        <span class="count">5</span>
                        <i class="GSIcon IconThumbUp Fz-m Va-m comment-thumb-up"></i>
                    </div>

                </div>
                <div class="text-container comments-truncate" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6721">
                    <p class="comment-content">
                    He has refused his Assent to Laws, the most wholesome and necessary for the public good.<br>
He has forbidden his Governors to pass Laws of immediate and pressing importance, unless suspended in their operation till his Assent should be obtained; and when so suspended, he has utterly neglected to attend to them.<br>
He has dissolved Representative Houses repeatedly, for opposing with manly firmness his invasions on the rights of the people.<br>
He has endeavoured to prevent the population of these States; for that purpose obstructing the Laws for Naturalization of Foreigners; refusing to pass others to encourage their migrations hither, and raising the conditions of new Appropriations of Lands.<br>
He has obstructed the Administration of Justice, by refusing his Assent to Laws for establishing Judiciary powers.<br>
He has made Judges dependent on his Will alone, for the tenure of their offices, and the amount and payment of their salaries.<br>
He has erected a multitude of New Offices, and sent hither swarms of Officers to harrass our people, and eat out their substance.<br>
He has kept among us, in times of peace, Standing Armies without the Consent of our legislatures.<br>
He has affected to render the Military independent of and superior to the Civil power.<br>
He has combined with others to subject us to a jurisdiction foreign to our constitution, and unacknowledged by our laws; giving his Assent to their Acts of pretended Legislation:<br>
For protecting them, by a mock Trial, from punishment for any Murders which they should commit on the Inhabitants of these States:<br>
For cutting off our Trade with all parts of the world:<br>
For imposing Taxes on us without our Consent:<br>
For depriving us in many cases, of the benefits of Trial by Jury:<br>
For transporting us beyond Seas to be tried for pretended offences<br>
For taking away our Charters, abolishing our most valuable Laws, and altering fundamentally the Forms of our Governments:<br>
<br>
In every stage of these Oppressions We have Petitioned for Redress in the most humble terms: Our repeated Petitions have been answered only by repeated injury. A Prince whose character is thus marked by every act which may define a Tyrant, is unfit to be the ruler of a free people.
                    </p>
                    <div class="more-text-button">More</div>

                <div class="text-container comments-truncate" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6749">
                    <p class="comment-content">

He shouldn't be involved in any way making public comments on issues like these, he, as president, should keep himself above and detached from these situations.<br>

                <div class="text-container comments-truncate" id="yui_3_16_0_1_1417502046200_6776">
                    <p class="comment-content">
                    First of all, as I understand it, the military gear being given to law enforcement is older, used, surplus stuff the military doesn't know what to do with anymore.  For example, the military just changed their issued handgun, the old style handguns will probably go to police departments around the country.  Second, the executive order signed by Obama is just smoke and mirrors, there is no substance to it.  Oversight is badly needed in the issue of military weapons to law enforcement.  There was a recent story detailing government employees such as county coroners and mail men requesting and getting military vehicles and weapons.  That's just crazy.  Next, there needs to be some kind of a training program in place if police are expected to use these military weapons correctly and effectively.  Police are primarily trained with the handgun, anything else is not as instinctual to them, training on a local level with supervision afterwards needs to be in place.  You can't just give a machine gun with an attached grenade launcher to a guy and say, "Here you go, now be careful".
                    </p>
                    <div class="more-text-button">More</div>
                </div>

Michael Brown was a thug. He robbed a store and then #$%$aulted a police officer. After failing to take his weapon he continued to attack, not retreat or surrender.<br>
<br>
Gentle giant my #$%$. Man, a lot of people must have been calling out sick from their jobs...oh wait.<br>
<br>
The lowest common denominator. Laughing and smiling as they steal and riot. Yeah, they really give a rat's #$%$ about Brown. And strangely enough, the few that do, are the worst and most ignorant.<br>
<br>
Obama and Holder are morons.

data-ylk="sec:strm;ed:0;bpos:1;pos:1;cpos:3;g:0823b0ec-8489-3372-a8bd-9a767f9304c8;tar:news.yahoo.com;ltxt:Albuquer;ct:1;rspns:nav;pkgt:3;r:4000010139;slk:title;itc:0;prov:Reuters;sort:1;intl:us;cat:default;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;elm:itm;ccode:grandSlam_news;" data-rapid_p="10">Albuquerque policeman who shot woman fired over camera lapse</a></h3><p class="summary mt-xxs">By Joseph J. Kolb ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (Reuters) - An Albuquerque police officer who shot and killed a 19-year-old woman in April was fired from the police force on Monday for failing to follow an order to turn on his uniform camera during all citizen contacts, police said.                     {
                        var repeats = 0, callback = null;
                        
                        sflIcon = Y.Node.create('<i class="icon-y-xsmall selected sfl-icon"></i>');
                        sflIcon.setStyles({
                            'opacity': 0,
                            'boxShadow': '0px 0px 20px #400090'
                        });
                        tabIcon.prepend(sflIcon);

                        callback = function ()
                        {
                            sflIcon.transition({
                                duration: 0.6,
                                opacity: (repeats + 1) % 2
                            });
                            repeats++;
                            if (repeats < 4)
                                Y.later(600, this, callback); // the animation duration for each is 600ms
                            else
                                Y.later(600, this, function () {sflIcon.remove();});
                        };
                        Y.later(10, this, callback);
                    }
                });});

    Y.later(10, this, function() {var queryString = window.location.search.substring(1),
            bcmt = /bcmt=([^&]*)/g,
            validate = /(?:[0-9a-f]{13}-[0-9a-f]{8}-(?:[0-9a-f]{4}-){3}[0-9a-f]{12})_?(?:[0-9a-z]{30}-[0-9a-f]{8}-(?:[0-9a-f]{4}-){3}[0-9a-f]{12})?/gi,
            bcmtParam,
            valid,
            toValidate,
            deeplink = '',
            defaultConfig = Y.Media.pageContentCommentsDefaultConfig;

            while (bcmtParam = bcmt.exec(queryString)) {
                toValidate = decodeURIComponent(bcmtParam[1]);
                if ('comments-postbox' === toValidate) {
                    deeplink = toValidate;
                } else {
                    while (valid = validate.exec(toValidate)) {
                        deeplink = valid[0];
                    }
                }
            }
            defaultConfig.config.deeplinkId = deeplink;

            if (window.MediaPerfTiming) {
                window.MediaPerfTiming.startTimer('Comments', 'm1');
            }

            Y.Media.pageContentComments = new Y.Media.ContentComments(defaultConfig);

            if (window.MediaPerfTiming) {
                window.MediaPerfTiming.endTimer('Comments', 'm1');
            }

            if (!(defaultConfig.config.enableCollapsedComment === 1) || defaultConfig.config.deeplinkId !== "") {
                Y.later(100, this, function() {
                    var node = Y.one('#comments-show') || null;

                    if (window.MediaPerfTiming) {
                        window.MediaPerfTiming.startTimer('Comments', 'm2');
                    }

                    Y.Media.pageContentComments.displayModule(node);
                });
            }});

DARLA_CONFIG.events.AUTO = {"name":"AUTO","sp":"7665145","ps":{"FILM":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"ESPON":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"TL1":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"SBTN-1":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"SBTN-0":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"WBTN-1":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"WBTN-0":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"BTN3":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"BTN2":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"BTN1":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"NE3-3":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"NE3-2":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"NE3-1":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"NE3-0":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"WPS":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"MAST":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"LDRB2":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"LDRB":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"LREC3":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"LREC2":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"},"LREC":{"autoMax":25,"autoIV":1,"autoRT":"45000"}},"sa":"Keyword_Id=\"Barack_Obama;Police;Executive_order;Military_technology;Assault_weapon;Police_officer;Shooting_of_Michael_Brown\" \"type\"=\"story\" ctopid=\"1996000;2040500;2042500;2051500;2054000;18857489;18858989\" ctype=\"fn_news;article\" lang=\"en-US\" rs=\"lmsid:a077000000CFoGyAAL;revsp:Yahoo! News;lpstaid:0724e367-3a4b-3efb-9dac-8a364c05cbdc\" wiki_topics=\"Barack_Obama;Police;Executive_order;Military_technology;Assault_weapon;Police_officer;Shooting_of_Michael_Brown\"  can_suppress_ugc=\"1\" LREC3=\"300x250,1x1\" LREC2=\"300x250,1x1\" LREC=\"300x250,1x1\" ESPON=\"120x30\"","sa_orig":"Keyword_Id=\"Barack_Obama;Police;Executive_order;Military_technology;Assault_weapon;Police_officer;Shooting_of_Michael_Brown\" \"type\"=\"story\" ctopid=\"1996000;2040500;2042500;2051500;2054000;18857489;18858989\" ctype=\"fn_news;article\" lang=\"en-US\" rs=\"lmsid:a077000000CFoGyAAL;revsp:Yahoo! News;lpstaid:0724e367-3a4b-3efb-9dac-8a364c05cbdc\" wiki_topics=\"Barack_Obama;Police;Executive_order;Military_technology;Assault_weapon;Police_officer;Shooting_of_Michael_Brown\"  can_suppress_ugc=\"1\" LREC3=\"300x250,1x1\" LREC2=\"300x250,1x1\" LREC=\"300x250,1x1\" ESPON=\"120x30\"","npv":1,"lvl":-3,"autoStart":1,"autoRT":"10000","ddd":1,"autoddg":1,"autoDDG":1,"ssl":"0"};
DARLA_CONFIG.beaconsDisabled = true;var priorityPosBatch = [],
    deferredPosBatch = [],
    aboveTheFold = [],
    perf_pos_set = false;

DARLA_CONFIG.onSuccess = function(act_evt_name, rendered_pos_ids)
{   
    var cnt = (rendered_pos_ids && rendered_pos_ids.length) || 0,   
        pos_id, pos_list = ['LREC','LREC2', 'LREC3'],
        adContainer, adModule, reactSidekick;
    
    reactSidekick = Y.one('#td-applet-react-sidekick_container');

    for(var k in pos_list){ 
        pos_id = pos_list[k];
        adModule = Y.one('.yog-rp #yom-ad-' + pos_id);
        if(!adModule) {
            continue;
        }
        if ('LREC' === pos_id) {
            adModule.addClass('yom-app');
            continue;
        }
        adContainer = adModule.one('div');
        if(!adContainer
             || (adContainer.getComputedStyle('width') === '1px'
                 && adContainer.getComputedStyle('height') === '1px')
             || adContainer.getComputedStyle('width') === '0px'
             || adContainer.getComputedStyle('height') === '0px'){
            adModule.setStyle('display', 'none');
            Y.log(pos_id + ' is hidden because either it has no container, it is 1x1 blank ads or it is not rendered', 'info', 'darla');
            continue;
        } else if (reactSidekick && pos_id === 'LREC3' && adModule.getStyle('display') === 'none') {
            adModule.show();
        }

        if (!reactSidekick) {
          adModule.addClass('yom-app');
        }
    }                  
    if (!cnt) {
        return;   
    }
    Y.Global.fire('darla:success', {    
        positions: rendered_pos_ids     
    });     
    Y.log('fetch ad success: ' + rendered_pos_ids.join(', '), 'info', 'darla');     
};

DARLA_CONFIG.onFailure = function (eventId) {
    var positions = null;
    try {
        positions = DARLA_CONFIG.events[eventId].ps.split(',');
    } catch (e) {}

    Y.Global.fire('darla:failure', {
        positions: positions
    });
    Y.log('fetch ad failure ' + eventId + (positions ? (': ' + positions.join(', ')) : ''), 'warn', 'darla');
};

DARLA_CONFIG.onFinishParse = function(eventId, result) {
    var noads = [], ps = result.ps(),
        i, l, position, posObj, mutexPos, posName, container, display, mast, set_ad_perf = false, renderedPos = [],
        re = /([A-Z0-9]+)(-[0-9]+)*/;

    
    if (AD_PERF_COMP.length > 0) {
        set_ad_perf = true;
    }
            
    for (i = 0, l = ps.length; i < l; i++) {
        position = ps[i];
        posObj = result.item(position);
            
            
        if (!posObj || posObj.hasErr) {
            noads.push(position);
            // noad should be included in the selective rendering 2nd batch as well
            deferredPosBatch.push(position);
        } else {
            // for selective rendering
            if (aboveTheFold.indexOf(position) >= 0) {
                priorityPosBatch.push(position);
            } else {                   
                deferredPosBatch.push(position);
            }
            
            // for xAFT
            if (posObj.size + '' !== '1x1') {
                renderedPos.push(position);
            }
        }
    }
            
    if (set_ad_perf && !perf_pos_set) {
        Y.log('set ___allAdsPos___', 'info', 'darla');
        window.___allAdsPos___ = renderedPos;
        perf_pos_set = true;
    } else {
        Y.log('No need to set ___allAdsPos___', 'info', 'darla');
    }

    /* MAST position is not part of AUTO rotate 
    * so check MAST is already present & visible on the page
    * If yes, then add it to ps, so that MUTEX Ad containers are as it is.
    */
    mast = Y.one('#yom-ad-MAST');
    if (mast && parseInt(mast.getStyle('height')) > 1 && mast.getStyle('display') !== 'none' && ps.indexOf('MAST') === -1) {
        ps.push('MAST');                          
    }			

    // handle mutual exclusion for client side fetched ads
    if (eventId === LB_EVENT || eventId === AUTO_EVENT) {
        for (position in MUTEX_ADS) {
            if (MUTEX_ADS.hasOwnProperty(position) && ps.indexOf(position) >= 0 && noads.indexOf(position) === -1) {
                for (i = 0, l = MUTEX_ADS[position].length; i < l; i++) {
                    mutexPos = MUTEX_ADS[position][i];
                    if (ps.indexOf(mutexPos) >= 0 && noads.indexOf(mutexPos) === -1) {

                      /** For FILM-1 (on lightbox) , if either LREC or LREC2 is returned with proper Ads (not 1x1 pixel)
                      *  then hide FILM-1 & show LRECs.
                      */      
                      if (position === 'FILM-1' && result.item(mutexPos).size + '' !== '1x1') {
                        noads.push(position);
                      } else {                                            
                        noads.push(mutexPos);
                      }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        // handle LREC 1x1 blank ad from client side
        if (ps.indexOf('LREC') >=0 && noads.indexOf('LREC') === -1) {
            if (result.item('LREC').size + '' === '1x1') {
                noads.push('LREC');
            }
        }

        for (i = 0, l = ps.length; i < l; i++) {
            position = ps[i];
            posName = re.exec(position)[1];
            container = Y.one('.yom-ad-'+posName);
            if (container) {
                display = container.getStyle('display');
                if (display === 'none' && noads.indexOf(position) === -1) {
                    container.show();
                } else if (display !== 'none' && noads.indexOf(position) >= 0) {
                    container.hide();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // reset the hight of the LDRB container
    if (ps.indexOf('LDRB') >= 0 && result.item('LDRB')) {
        
        if (noads.indexOf('LDRB') <= 0){
            var clearAdModule = Y.one('#yom-ad-LDRB');
            if (result.item('LDRB').size + '' !== '1x1') {
                clearAdModule.setStyle('height', '');
                Y.log('LDRB height is reset to blank.', 'info', 'darla');
            } else {
                clearAdModule.setStyle('height', '5px');
                Y.log('LDRB height is reset to 5px.', 'info', 'darla');
            }
        } else {
            Y.log('LDRB is noad or size is 1x1', 'info', 'darla');
        }
    }

    // LREC3 React Sidekick C1Backfill
    if (eventId === LREC3_EVENT && typeof SidekickAdsHandlerInstance !== "undefined" && noads.indexOf('LREC3') !== -1) {
      YMedia.Global.fire("sidekick:backfill");
    }

}
    /* setting up DARLA events */
    var w = window,
        D = w.DARLA,
        C = w.DARLA_CONFIG,
        DM = w.DOC_DOMAIN_SET || 0;
    if (D) {
        if (D && C) {
            C.dm = DM;
        }


        /* setting DARLA configuration */
        DARLA.config(C);

        /* prefetch Ads if applicable */
        DARLA.prefetched("fc");

        /* rendering prefetched Ad */

        DARLA.render();


    }

    return {
        event: function (eventId, spaceId, adsSa) {
            if (window.DARLA && eventId) {
                var eventConfig = {};
                if (!isNaN(spaceId)) {
                    eventConfig.sp = spaceId;
                }
                /* Site attributes */
                adsSa = (typeof adsSa !== "undefined" && adsSa !== null) ? adsSa : "";
                eventConfig.sa = DARLA_CONFIG.events[eventId].sa_orig.replace ? DARLA_CONFIG.events[eventId].sa_orig.replace("ADSSA", adsSa) : "";
                DARLA.event(eventId, eventConfig);
            }
        },
        render: function() {
            if (!!(Y.one('#yom-slideshow-lightbox') || Y.one('#content-lightbox') || false)) {
                /* skip configuring DARLA in case of lightbox being triggered */
            } else {
                // abort current darla action
                if (DARLA && DARLA.abort) {
                    DARLA.abort();
                }

                /* setting DARLA configuration */
                DARLA.config(DARLA_CONFIG);

                /* prefetch Ads if applicable */
                DARLA.prefetched("fc");

                /* rendering prefetched Ad */
                DARLA.render();
            }
        }
    };

})(); /* End of YUI.AdsDarla */

YUI.AdsDarla.darla = { fetch: (Y.bind(YUI.AdsDarla.event, YUI.AdsDarla, 'darla')) };    YUI.AdsDarla.fetch = YUI.AdsDarla.darla.fetch;
    Y.Global.fire('darla:ready'); 
}); /* End of YMedia */}); /* End of YMedia.later */var ___adLT___ = [];
function onDarlaFinishPosRender(position) {
  if (window.performance !== undefined && window.performance.now !== undefined) {
    var ltime = window.performance.now();
    ___adLT___.push(['AD_'+position, Math.round(ltime)]);
    setTimeout(function () {
        if (window.LH !== undefined && window.YAFT !== undefined && window.YAFT.isInitialized()) {
          window.YAFT.triggerCustomTiming('yom-ad-'+position, '', ltime);
        }
    },1000);
  }
}

if ((DARLA && DARLA.config) || DARLA_CONFIG) {
    var oldConf = DARLA.config() || DARLA_CONFIG || null;
    if (oldConf) {
        if (oldConf.onFinishPosRender) {
            (function() {
                var oldVersion = oldConf.onFinishPosRender;
                oldConf.onFinishPosRender = function(position) {
                    onDarlaFinishPosRender(position);
                    return oldVersion.apply(me, arguments);
                };
            })();
        } else {
            oldConf.onFinishPosRender  = onDarlaFinishPosRender;
        }
        DARLA.config(oldConf);
    }
}

</script><script type="text/javascript">if ('undefined' !== typeof(YMedia)) {
YMedia.use('event-custom',function(Y){
    Y.log('ads:dmros listening for fallbacks');
    Y.Global.on('ads:dmros:fallbacks',function(e){
        if (!YUI.namespace('Media').dmros_serverside) {
            Y.log('ads:dmros inside fallbacks event handler');
            var fallbacks = YUI.namespace('Media').ads_dmros_fallbacks || {};
            var noad = ['LDRB','TL1','ESPON'];
            for (var pos in fallbacks) {
                if (fallbacks.hasOwnProperty(pos)) {
                    if (-1 === noad.indexOf(pos) || 'function' !== typeof(fallbacks[pos])) {
                        continue;
                    }
                    fallbacks[pos]();
                }
            }
            YUI.namespace('Media').dmros_serverside = true;
        }
    });
});
}</script></center></div></center></div>
